turn.2: Midway's Greatest Arcade Hits Midway's Greatest Arcade Hits is an arcade game compilation released for the Nintendo 64, Dreamcast, and Game Boy Advance.

turn.6: The first volume was released for the Nintendo 64, Dreamcast and Game Boy Advance.
